role.argrole: thing related to or attributed to purchase or buy(ing)

example.parse: (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تتميز) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN كون) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3FS ها)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ_COMP+CASE_DEF_ACC اكبر) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN قوة)) (ADJP (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN شرائية) (CONJ و) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN استهلاكية))) (PP (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المنطقة)))
